### INSTALL ###
IF(CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18/ndk-build.cmd")
		DKINSTALL(http://123.15.57.34/android/repository/android-ndk-r18-windows-x86_64.zip android-ndk-r18 android-ndk-r18)
	ENDIF()
	GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(ANDROID_NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18" ABSOLUTE)  #Get the windows short filepath
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_APPLE)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r18-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r18-darwin-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r18-darwin-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	DKSET(NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18")
ENDIF()

IF(CMAKE_HOST_LINUX)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18)
		DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(www.internet.com/android-ndk-r18-linux-x86_64.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/android-ndk-r18-linux-x86_64.zip)
		DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/android-ndk-r18-linux-x86_64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
	ENDIF()
	DKSET(NDK "${3RDPARTY}/android-ndk-r18")
ENDIF()
